name: Marcos Amorim
current: building the rdrt URL shortener stack
about:
I'm a backend-focused developer with a soft spot for clean architecture and reliable delivery.

Over the last 15+ years I've built web platforms and CMS-driven sites using Python, Django, and Wagtail, often shipping end-to-end features in fast-moving teams.

I enjoy the full lifecycle from design to deployment, and I keep things running smoothly with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and CI/CD.

These days I'm adding FastAPI to my toolkit and exploring modern backend patterns.
